DEMO_412_MSG_010: ̃Alright! Now, take a look around! Do you see me?
DEMO_412_MSG_020: ̃Come on, look a little harder! I'm up here!
DEMO_412_MSG_100:
̃They'll find us here, there's no doubt about it. We must find a better hiding place immediately.
ā
DEMO_412_MSG_030:
̃Oh-hoh-hoh-hoh... you really do need someone looking out for you.
ā
DEMO_412_MSG_110:
̃There's a vacant room on the 4th floor, northeast from here. Let's meet there.
ā
DEMO_412_MSG_040:
̃It's good to finally see you again, ȁ. 
I had a feeling you'd make it here.
ā
DEMO_412_MSG_120: ̃Don't use the stairs to go down, though. Head up to the roof, and go around.
DEMO_412_MSG_050: ̃What? ... What's with that look? That's a look of utter confusion.
DEMO_412_MSG_060:
̃Oh, right... you've lost your memories, haven't you?
Well then... allow me to re-introduce myself to you.
DEMO_412_MSG_070: ̃My name is Lucia, the leader of the Resistance. I've been the one leading the fight against Mother.
DEMO_412_MSG_080:
́All those who defy Mother and our Dark Master shall not live to tell of it! 
ā
DEMO_412_MSG_090: ́Do not let him escape this place alive! Search the Bastille, find him, and destroy him!
